definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: Let God be true, and every man a liar.
sentences.chinese: 不如說，神是真實的，人都是虛謊的。

sentences.english: If I have walked with vanity, or if my foot hath hasted to deceit;
sentences.chinese: 我若與虛謊同行，腳若追隨詭詐。

sentences.english: Fleeing unclean and evil and evading all other falseness .
sentences.chinese: 逃離不潔與罪惡，並躲避一切虛謊。
